document_data.name: Durlan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Durlan''' was a [[moon elven]]

{{quote|This ring is not something to be taken lightly. There is a price to this magic. You will feel great pain, more severe than anything you can imagine, and it will leave you spent, but the ring will keep you safe from any evil magic.|Durlan to [[Thazienne Uskevren]]}}
document_data.Activities: Durlan was considered a good and noble person. He spent his time working for the good of all beings.
document_data.Hisotry: Some years before the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Durlan met Thazienne Uskevren, a daughter of the [[Uskevren]] family of Selgaunt. The noble's daughter spent her childhood on the unsavory streets where she mastered her [[thieves]]'s skills. The moon elf was found of the child, and after she saved a baby from the midden, Durlan gifted her an [[emerald]] ''[[ring of projection]]'' that one day saved Thazi's life.
